snippet: The United States on Monday urged Bangladesh to free the human rights activist Adilur Rahman Khan, saying his detention had a “chilling effect” on civil society.
lead_paragraph: The United States on Monday urged Bangladesh to free the human rights activist Adilur Rahman Khan, saying his detention had a “chilling effect” on civil society.

headline.main: Bangladesh: U.S. Calls for Activist’s Release
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: U.S. Calls for Activist’s Release

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
